attributes.action: make all disabled parking bays inforcable by police
attributes.additional_details: i would like the government to make all disabled bays inforcable by police wheither they be in car parks or outside private residences at the moment disabled people suffer pain and fustration when people without a disability park in or block disabled  bays and all the police can do is ask the person concerned to be more respectful and move their vehicle if they refuse their hands are tied and they can do nothing surely this should be sorted because people are not respectful anymore and disabled people need respect and understanding not biggotry and abbuse
